summary: Companion and maybe future wife for the hero
descriptionHtml:
----------------------
Julianna Beauchampt - Follower Mage Girl by Sandraniks
----------------------

This mod adds the very pretty (IMO) magicka girl named Julianna Beauchampt.
She is Breton and she is Combat Mage Conjuration and Necromancer. Her main weapon are the Conjured Atronachs)))
She has Calculated Level from 10 min to 50 max (like Marcurio has)
Meet her in Ivarsteadt in Vilemyr Inn.
She also can be married if you have Mara amulet:)
She is essential
Spell List: Magic Armor and Regeneration perks + RepelUndead+ Destruction Spells




--------------------
Installation
--------------------

REQUIRES APACHI SKYHAIR V 1.3! IT WON`T WORK WITHOUT THIS MOD

There are three variants of Julianna`s appearance:
- blue eyes and red curly hair
- blue eyes and dark long hair
- blue eyes and blond straight hair
Install all content from ONE folder only to avoid the face-body color contrast bug
Just copy the folder content to your Skyrim Data folder than activate esp.file
I made it to change the appearance of my partner as simply as I change my char. Now you may change Julianna reinstalling the data files from another archive folder)))

Other mods you need for proper appearance

Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
The Eyes Of Beauty http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13722
RANs Eyebrow Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812
RANs Eyeliner Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701
UNP Female Body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
VAnilla Skin Texture v1-8 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

All cheers and credits go to the modders whose mods I`ve used

-------------------
How to uninstall
-------------------
Just delete the esp.file from the Data folder



-------------------
Bugs
-------------------
Black face bug is possible in some cases but I haven`t met it so far...




Feel free to reuse or reupload this file just give credits if you like it

Have fun!
author: Sandraniks
